resources.string:
"The player library can be utilized in two way:
 - It can be initialized with an NPOTag which the application implementing the library should supply. The app should then also supply the PageTracker's when creating a NPOPlayer.
 - Alternatively, if the app doesn't use NPOTag for it's own tracking, the app could supply the needed configuration parameters (brand, brandId, platformVersion, platform and optional debugging) and then the library will create the NPOTag.

This test library had the option to test with both different implementations. If you want to switch after the selection, kill the app and restart it for a different selection. The brandId for this test app is: %d"
The list below this contains url streams that can be directly loaded in the Player without using a StreamLink:
Are you sure you want to delete the offline content for "%1$s"?
